name: PR Merged to Main
on: [push]
permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write
  
jobs:
  deploy:    
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm install
      - name: Build
        run: cd frontend && npx projen build
